item.title: Building a J2EE app using IntelliJ Idea and deploying on Heroku
item.description: Let’s see how to build a basic Java Enterprise (fondly known as J2EE) application, made up of a Servlet and a JSP file, with the help of the popular IDE by Jetbrains, IntelliJ Idea.
